conjurer:Genesis.NAME: Genesis
DESCRIPTION: Summon cards are relegated to the {Control Pile}, and can be played from this pile by paying HP equal to its cost. This HP is refunded when the Summon is Withdrawn or at the end of combat if the Summon is still alive. Summons intercept all damage that you would take.

conjurer:Trinity.NAME: Trinity
DESCRIPTION: You can encounter cards and relics from {The Ironclad}, {The Silent}, and {The Defect}.
